#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int a[100],n,p=1;;
    cin>>n; 
    while(n!=0)
    { int sum=0,ans=0,i;
              for(i=0;i<n;i++)
              {scanf("%d",&a[i]);
              sum+=a[i];}
              sum=sum/n;
               for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                 {if(a[i]>sum)
                ans=ans+(a[i]-sum);}
                cout<<"Set #"<<p<<endl;
                cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<ans<<".";
                cout<<'\n';
                cin>>n;
                p++;
                }
}
